blogPost.excerpt: Track important tasks and projects, create upcoming events, keep notes and control expenses in one notion table. You can quickly find your to-do list or see how much money you spent last week.
blogPost.body: Track important tasks and projects, create upcoming events, keep notes and control expenses in one notion table. You can quickly find your to-do list or see how much money you spent last week.
blogPost.title: Magic Board for Notion - Organize your entire life with one board
blogPost.author: Damir Bektilov

localize.description: 跟踪重要的任务和项目，创建即将到来的事件，保持笔记和控制费用在一个概念表中。你可以快速找到你的待办事项，或者看到你上周花了多少钱。
localize.tagline: 用一块板子整理你的整个生活

localize.description: 跟蹤重要的任務和項目，創建即將到來的事件，保持筆記和控制費用在一個概念表中。你可以快速找到你的待辦事項，或者看到你上週花了多少錢。
localize.tagline: 用一塊板子整理你的整個生活

previous.excerpt: Now you can be part of the Presearch Decentralized Search experience by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine while earning PRE tokens.
previous.title: Presearch 2.0 - The network powering presearch decentralized search engine

localize.description: 现在，你可以通过操作Presearch节点，帮助推动Presearch分散式搜索引擎，同时赚取PRE代币，成为Presearch分散式搜索体验的一部分。
localize.tagline: 为presearch去中心化搜索引擎提供动力的网络。

localize.description: 現在，你可以通過操作Presearch節點，幫助推動Presearch分散式搜索引擎，同時賺取PRE代幣，成爲Presearch分散式搜索體驗的一部分。
localize.tagline: 爲presearch去中心化搜索引擎提供動力的網絡。

next.excerpt: Upgrade Zoom with a bluetooth connected keypad that lets you run Zoom with the click of a button. Video calls are easier with your twenty-two favorite Zoom shortcuts on one amazing hotkey pad. Available for both Windows and Mac.
next.title: Zapp Pad - Say goodbye to Zoom fails and communicate with confidence

localize.description: 升级的Zoom与蓝牙连接的键盘，让你运行Zoom与点击一个按钮。视频通话更容易与你最喜欢的22个Zoom快捷键在一个惊人的热键板。适用于Windows和Mac。
升級的Zoom與藍牙連接的鍵盤，讓你運行Zoom與點擊一個按鈕。視頻通話更容易與你最喜歡的22個Zoom快捷鍵在一個驚人的熱鍵板。適用於Windows和Mac。
